reviewText:
Whigfield doesn't get played on the video channels here in America,((the ones that actually PLAY videos anymore)) so what a great surprise that Was A Time dvd is released in US/Canadian format!  The description, what very little there is of one, says 1 disc, but the copy I got had 2 discs, the dvd and the Was A Time CD!! (Whigfield 4 + "Was A Time") Great surprise, even though I have Whigfield 4 and the "Was A Time" cd single.

This is a GREAT deal for the dvd AND cd!!  Get yours today!
